getCurrentAlbum.desc: Gets the name of the current Album
getCurrentAlbum.doc:
Gets the name of the current Album

 * None

Returns:
 * A string containing the Album of the current track, or nil if an error occurred

returns: * A string containing the Album of the current track, or nil if an error occurred

getCurrentArtist.desc: Gets the name of the current Artist
getCurrentArtist.doc:
Gets the name of the current Artist

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A string containing the Artist of the current track, or nil if an error occurred
getCurrentArtist.name: getCurrentArtist
returns: * A string containing the Artist of the current track, or nil if an error occurred

getCurrentTrack.desc: Gets the name of the current track
getCurrentTrack.doc:
Gets the name of the current track

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A string containing the name of the current track, or nil if an error occurred
getCurrentTrack.name: getCurrentTrack
returns: * A string containing the name of the current track, or nil if an error occurred

getDuration.desc: Gets the duration (in seconds) of the current song
getDuration.doc:
Gets the duration (in seconds) of the current song

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * The number of seconds long the current song is, 0 if no song is playing
getDuration.name: getDuration
returns: * The number of seconds long the current song is, 0 if no song is playing

getPlaybackState.desc: Gets the current playback state of iTunes
getPlaybackState.doc:
Gets the current playback state of iTunes

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A string containing one of the following constants:
   - `hs.itunes.state_stopped`
   - `hs.itunes.state_paused`
   - `hs.itunes.state_playing`
getPlaybackState.name: getPlaybackState
returns: * A string containing one of the following constants:

getPosition.desc: Gets the playback position (in seconds) of the current song
getPosition.doc:
Gets the playback position (in seconds) of the current song

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A number indicating the current position in the song
getPosition.name: getPosition
returns: * A number indicating the current position in the song

getVolume.desc: Gets the current iTunes volume setting
getVolume.doc:
Gets the current iTunes volume setting

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A number, between 1 and 100, containing the current iTunes playback volume
getVolume.name: getVolume
returns: * A number, between 1 and 100, containing the current iTunes playback volume

isPlaying.desc: Returns whether iTunes is currently playing
isPlaying.doc:
Returns whether iTunes is currently playing

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A boolean value indicating whether iTunes is currently playing a track, or nil if an error occurred (unknown player state). Also returns false if the application is not running
isPlaying.name: isPlaying
returns: * A boolean value indicating whether iTunes is currently playing a track, or nil if an error occurred (unknown player state). Also returns false if the application is not running

isRunning.desc: Returns whether iTunes is currently open. Most other functions in hs.itunes will automatically start the application, so this function can be used to guard against that.
isRunning.doc:
Returns whether iTunes is currently open. Most other functions in hs.itunes will automatically start the application, so this function can be used to guard against that.

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A boolean value indicating whether the iTunes application is running.
isRunning.name: isRunning
returns: * A boolean value indicating whether the iTunes application is running.
